item.title: Location
item.description: Alessandro Burigana's mailing and office addresses at the Faculty of Engineering of the Free University of Bolzano.

item.title: Office Hours
item.description: Schedule and location for Professor Dr von Igelfeld's office hours.

item.title: A Semantic Approach to Decidability in Epistemic Planning
DELPHIC: Practical DEL Planning via Possibilities
item.description: The paper proposes a formulation of DEL-based epistemic planning based on a different kind of object, called possibility. JELIA 2023.

item.title: The Epistemic Planning Domain Definition Language (Short Paper)
item.description: The paper introduces the EPDDL action description language for DEL-based epistemic planning. IPS 2022.

item.title: DELPHIC: Towards an Efficient Possibility-based Epistemic Planning Framework
item.description: The paper proposes a formulation of DEL-based epistemic planning based on a different kind of object, called possibility. OVERLAY 2022.

item.title: Multi-Agent Epistemic Planning with Inconsistent Beliefs, Trust and Lies
item.description: This paper provides an epistemic planning framework for reasoning about inconsistent beliefs of agents, trust relations and lies. PRICAI 2021.

item.title: Modelling Multi-Agent Epistemic Planning in ASP
item.description: This paper explores the performances of an ASP model for epistemic planning called PLATO. ICLP, TPLP 2020.

item.title: EFP 2.0: A Multi-Agent Epistemic Solver with Multiple E-State Representations
item.description: This paper presents EFP 2.0, a multi-agent epistemic planner based on an alternative state representations called possibilities. ICAPS 2020.

item.title: List of Irregular Verbs Across Romance Languages
item.description: This dataset contains all irregular verbs in known Romance languages.

item.title: Lectures at the Villa of Reduced Circumstances
item.description: This graduate course presents classical results in Romance philology.

item.title: Portugese Irregular Verbs
item.description: This book discusses Portugese irregular verbs in great details.

item.title: Profanity in Early Irish
item.description: This undergraduate course discusses profanity in Early Irish.
